334.name: Rushdown
334.description: Whenever you enter Wrath, draw 2 cards.

335.name: Sanctity
335.description: Gain 6(9)  Block. If the previous card played was a Skill, draw 2 card.

336.name: Sands of Time
336.description: Retain. Deal 20(26) damage. Whenever this card is  Retained, lower its cost by 1.

337.name: Signature Move
337.description: Can only be played if this is the only attack in your hand. Deal 30(40) damage.

338.name: Simmering Fury
338.description: At the start of your next turn, enter Wrath and draw 2(3) cards.

339.name: Study
339.description: At the end of your turn, shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

340.name: Swivel
340.description: Gain 8(11)  Block. The next Attack you play costs 0.

341.name: Talk to the Hand
341.description: Deal 5(7) damage. Whenever you attack this enemy, gain 2(3)  Block. Exhaust.

342.name: Tantrum
342.description: Deal 3 damage 3(4) times. Enter Wrath. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

343.name: Wallop
343.description: Deal 9(12) damage. Gain  Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

344.name: Wave of the Hand
344.description: Whenever you gain  Block this turn, apply 1(2)  Weak to ALL enemies.

345.name: Weave
345.description: Deal 4(6) damage. Whenever you Scry and would discard this card, add it into your hand instead.

347.name: Windmill Strike
347.description: Retain. Deal 7(10) damage. Whenever this card is  Retained, increase its damage by 4(5).

349.name: Wreath of Flame
349.description: Your next Attack deals 5(8) additional damage.

350.name: Alpha
350.description: (Innate.) Shuffle a Beta into your draw pile. Exhaust.

351.name: Blasphemy
351.description: (Retain.) Enter Divinity. Die next turn. Exhaust.

352.name: Brilliance
352.description: Deal 12(16) damage. Deals additional damage for all  Mantra gained this combat.

353.name: Conjure Blade
353.description: Shuffle an Expunger with X(+1) into your draw pile. Exhaust.

354.name: Deus Ex Machina
354.description: Unplayable. When you draw this card, add 2(3) Miracles into your hand. Exhaust.

355.name: Deva Form
355.description: Ethereal. At the start of your turn, gain Energy and increase this gain by 1. (not Ethereal.)

356.name: Devotion
356.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2(3)  Mantra.

357.name: Establishment
357.description: (Innate.) Whenever a card is  Retained, lower its cost by 1.

358.name: Judgment
358.description: If the enemy has 30(40) or less HP, set their HP to 0.

359.name: Lesson Learned
359.description: Deal 10(13) damage. If this kills an enemy, Upgrade a random card in your deck. Exhaust.

360.name: Master Reality
360.description: Whenever a card is created during combat, Upgrade it.

361.name: Omniscience
361.description: Choose a card in your draw pile. Play the chosen card twice and Exhaust it. Exhaust.

362.name: Ragnarok
362.description: Deal 5(6) damage to a random enemy 5(6) times.

363.name: Scrawl
363.description: Draw cards until your hand is full. Exhaust.

364.name: Spirit Shield
364.description: Gain 3(4)  Block for each card in your hand.

365.name: Vault
365.description: Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn. Exhaust.

366.name: Wish
366.description: Choose one: Gain 6(8)  Plated Armor, 3(4)  Strength, or 25(30) Gold. Exhaust.
